com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class TextToSpeech

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.AndroidNonvisibleComponent
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.TextToSpeech
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, OnDestroyListener, OnResumeListener, OnStopListener

    public class TextToSpeech
extends AndroidNonvisibleComponent
implements Component, OnStopListener, OnResumeListener, OnDestroyListener
    Component for converting text to speech using either the built-in TTS library or the TextToSpeech Extended library (which must be pre-installed for Android versions earlier than Donut).
    Author:
    markf@google.com (Mark Friedman)

        private static void initLocaleMaps()

      • Result

        public boolean Result()
        Result property getter method.

      • Language

        public void Language(java.lang.String language)
        Sets the language for this TextToSpeech component.
        Parameters:
        language - is the ISO2 (i.e. 2 letter) or ISO3 (i.e. 3 letter) language code to set this TextToSpeech component to.

      • iso3LanguageToLocale

        private static java.util.Locale iso3LanguageToLocale(java.lang.String iso3Language)

      • Pitch

        public void Pitch(float pitch)
        Sets the speech pitch for the TextToSpeech. 1.0 is the normal pitch, lower values lower the tone of the synthesized voice, greater values increase it.
        Parameters:
        pitch - a pitch level between 0 and 2

      • Pitch

        public float Pitch()
        Reports the current value of speech pitch

      • SpeechRate

        public void SpeechRate(float speechRate)
        Sets the speech rate
        Parameters:
        speechRate - Speech rate 1.0 is the normal speech rate, lower values slow down the speech (0.5 is half the normal speech rate), greater values accelerate it (2.0 is twice the normal speech rate).

      • SpeechRate

        public float SpeechRate()
        Reports the current value of speechRate

      • Language

        public java.lang.String Language()
        Gets the language for this TextToSpeech component. This will be either an ISO2 (i.e. 2 letter) or ISO3 (i.e. 3 letter) code depending on which kind of code the property was set with.
        Returns:
        the language code for this TextToSpeech component.

      • Country

        public void Country(java.lang.String country)
        Sets the country for this TextToSpeech component.
        Parameters:
        country - is the ISO2 (i.e. 2 letter) or ISO3 (i.e. 3 letter) country code to set this TextToSpeech component to.

      • iso3CountryToLocale

        private static java.util.Locale iso3CountryToLocale(java.lang.String iso3Country)

        public java.lang.String Country()
        Gets the country for this TextToSpeech component. This will be either an ISO2 (i.e. 2 letter) or ISO3 (i.e. 3 letter) code depending on which kind of code the property was set with.
        Returns:
        country code for this TextToSpeech component.
